Title: The Number of Rats
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Cole Maliska (teleplay by), Matt Olmstead (teleplay by), Matt Olmstead (story), Warren Leight (story)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Benson is in Chicago helping Intelligence with a rape/murder case similar to a case in New York from a decade ago, so she calls in Fin and Amaro for assistance.
